ygData.subject: Re: Arrows
ygData.msgSnippet: I m not a fletcher, I m an archer, need to find a fletcher to keep me stocked up with arrows :) Salr D Taynkk Dark Warrior of The Kith Veeshan ... From:
ygData.messageBody:
I'm not a fletcher, I'm an archer, need to find a fletcher to keep me stocked up with arrows :)

Salr D'Taynkk
Dark Warrior of The Kith
Veeshan

>>> <XxKommiexX@...> 5.21.99 5:48:59 PM >>>
From: XxKommiexX@...

Wow a fletcher dude on Veeshan. I want to do fletching, but not many places
have the parts. Oh well. I am also evil, so that would make it really hard to
get the parts. Give me a tell, and we can just talk about fletching or
something.

Danthin, Human Magician
~Veeshan~
